The saints mansions in heaven a discourse occasioned by, and preached upon the death and funeral of Mrs. Elizabeth Brookes (late wife to Mr. Samuel Brookes ...) who deceased March 13th, 1697 / by Tho. Doolittle ... Doolittle, Thomas, 1632?-1707.

Printed for John Lawrence ..., London : 1698.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
